description: ​The U.S. Department of Justice has filed a lawsuit against social media platform TikTok and its parent company, ByteDance, alleging widespread violations of children's privacy laws. [...]
title: US sues TikTok for violating children privacy protection laws

description: A recent Google Chrome update has broken the drag-and-drop feature in the Downloads bubble that previously allowed you to drag and drop downloaded files onto any website or tab in the browser. [...]
title: Google Chrome bug breaks drag and drop from Downloads bubble

description: Google Chrome is now encouraging uBlock Origin users who have updated to the latest version to switch to other ad blockers before Manifest v2 extensions are disabled [...]
title: Google Chrome warns uBlock Origin may soon be disabled

description: U.S. and German law enforcement seized the domain of the crypto wallet platform Cryptonator, used by ransomware gangs, darknet marketplaces, and other illicit services, and indicted its operator. [...]
title: Cryptonator seized for laundering ransom payments, stolen crypto

description: Cybersecurity company CrowdStrike has been sued by investors who say it provided false claims about its Falcon platform after a bad security update led to a massive global IT outage causing the stock price to tumble almost 38%. [...]
title: CrowdStrike sued by investors over massive global IT outage
